message: Uber, Amazon, Google, Youtube, and PayPal are all might seem different but the core of their work that they are a PLATFORM comes with an innovated business model and reliable ways to manage resources and products and services and make it publicly available. This lecture is really good to explain the main concepts but if you are interesting for more insights I recommend reading this book "Platform Revolution: How Networked Markets Are Transforming the Economy--And How to Make Them Work for You."
story: Muhammad El-Hennawy shared a link to the group: Egyptian Geeks.
name: Platform Revolution - Lecture at MIT Platform Symposium by Geoff Parker
caption: youtube.com
description: Presentation at MIT Platform Symposium July 26, 2013
